subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: Donnie Walsh, the Knicks executive, is still taken aback at the intensity, the volume and the size of the herd that surrounds him each time controversy erupts — which, with the Knicks, is often.
